data.prayer: Father, your Word is essential for life and growth. Please challenge the 20,864 cultural Christians in the state of Galápagos to read your Word for themselves today.
data.verse: It is written: 'Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that comes from the mouth of God.'

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Galápagos, Ecuador
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, we pray that the state of Galápagos be filled with simple churches in every neighborhood.
data.verse: For the earth will be full of the knowledge of the Lord, as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Galápagos, Ecuador with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Galápagos to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Jew, Spanish-speaking people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Galápagos.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: Father, help the 2,653 believers in Galápagos to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.section_summary:
the state of Galápagos, Ecuador has a population of 25,100.

We estimate Galápagos has 2,653 people who might know Jesus, 20,864 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,583 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 9 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in Galápagos, Ecuador to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.

location.name: Galápagos
